text: Tarzan Finds a Son! is a 1939 jungle adventure Tarzan movie. It is based on the fictional characters and concepts created by Edgar Rice Burroughs. It is the fourth of the six MGM Tarzan movies starring Johnny Weissmuller and Maureen O'Sullivan. Johnny Sheffield makes his debut as Boy in this movie. ==Story== An airplane flying to Cape Town crashes in the jungle. Everyone is killed, except a baby. Cheeta rescues the baby. Tarzan and Jane adopt him. They name him "Boy". Five years later, a search party comes to the jungle looking for Boy. He is the heir to a fortune worth millions. Jane wants Boy to go back to civilization. In the end though, Boy stays with Tarzan and Jane in the jungle. ==Related pages== *Tarzan Escapes, prequel to this movie *Tarzan's Secret Treasure, sequel to this movie Category:1939 movies Category:Tarzan movies Category:Jungle movies Category:Sequel movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Thorpe
title: Tarzan Finds a Son!
